|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;25P32V6P; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Atmel;AT25F512B; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Elpida;J1108BFBG-DJ-F; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32.12;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA, SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), JP3 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822108091 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== It's a 2-bay NAS. This device has 2 USB 3.0 ports and 1 USB 2.0 port.
{{See also|List of NAS Devices|Synology DiskStation Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' Armada 300 88F6282 @1.6GHz (ARM V5) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4MB SPI NOR Flash, 2x SATA *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 5.4A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:DS212 01.jpg| File:DS212 02.jpg| File:DS212 03.jpg| File:DS212 04.jpg| File:DS212 05.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Synology DS212 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Synology DS212 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
